> "Beautiful Soup sits on top of popular Python parsers like http://lxml.de/[lxml] and http://code.google.com/p/html5lib/[html5lib]" 
-- https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/

== Installation

[,bash]
----
uv add beautifulsoup4
----
